keywords.value: Open Letter to the Fraudsters of Islamophobia Who Play Into Racists' Hands (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

byline.original: By AURELIEN BREEDEN and DAN BILEFSKY
byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden reported from Paris, and Dan Bilefsky from London.

lead_paragraph: The book, published Thursday, was finished just two days before the editor, Stéphane Charbonnier, was killed by Islamist extremists.

headline.print_headline: With Posthumous Book, Charlie Hebdo Editor Proves Defiant in Death
headline.main: Book by Slain Charlie Hebdo Editor Argues Islam Is Not Exempt From Ridicule

snippet: The book, published Thursday, was finished just two days before the editor, Stéphane Charbonnier, was killed by Islamist extremists.
abstract: Open Letter to the Fraudsters of Islamophobia Who Play Into Racists' Hands, book by slain Charlie Hebdo editor Stephane Charbonnier, argues that Islam is not exempt from ridicule.
